#summary Using fonts

=== Introduction ===
Fonts are used to create text in charts along x- and y-axes, labels, legend and title. pChart4mw enables You to set your preferred font for text and for the title seperately.

=== Default font ===
If no general preference is configured in localsettings.php or in the chart definition with the font parameters the default font is tahoma.
